message: Let's split it down the middle, fair and square.
I think I deserve a bit more, 60-40 is still a good deal for you.
Okay, I'll budge a bit.  55-45 feels fairer to me, but we need to wrap this up before inflation eats away at our gains.
Inflation is hitting you harder, I think 70-30 is a good compromise considering the circumstances.
Okay, I'm getting squeezed by inflation. 40-60 it is. Let's finish this already!
